titleStmt.title: The information of William Lewis, Gent, delivered at the bar of the House of Commons, the eighteenth of November, 1680 together with his further narrative relating thereto : in all which is contained a confirmation of the popish plot and the justice of the executions done upon Grove, Pickering, and the
titleStmt.author: Lewis, William, Gent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
